painPoints: Hit AutomateFlow limits during Black Friday
Manual processes blocking scaling from 200 to 2,000 customers
Scattered automation tools (AutomateFlow, n8n, ad hoc)
CSMs switching between SalesCloud and TaskBoard

stakeholders.name: James Liao
stakeholders.title: (Title unclear, enterprise architecture lead?)
stakeholders.notes: Champion - Hired specifically to solve this problem. Technical, detail-oriented, price-conscious but not cheap.

context.history: Discovery call revealed strong pain, clear use cases, and engaged champion but pricing concerns emerged

metrics.notes: They frame it as "burning problem" not ROI - scaling from 200 → 2,000 customers. Bottleneck is ops capacity: could onboard 15-20 customers/week vs current 5 if automated.

economicBuyer.notes: Will was "brought on board" to set up enterprise architecture. Unclear if he owns budget or needs approval. Need to map org.

decisionCriteria.notes: Clear: (1) integrations to standard stack, (2) trigger flexibility/webhooks, (3) pricing/usage limits/reliability, (4) GDPR+SOC compliance, (5) guardrails/roles, (6) AI optional

decisionProcess.notes: March 1 deadline. February pilot with 50-user team migrating to ClickUp. Who else needs to sign off?

paperProcess.notes: Not discussed. Need to understand procurement, legal.

pain.notes: Blew past limits Black Friday. Manual processes blocking growth. Currently scattered (Zapier, n8n, ad hoc). Need to centralize before scaling.

champion.notes: Will is engaged, driving evaluation, shared detailed requirements. He's the right persona (enterprise architecture owner).

competition.notes: Workato is primary. Not leaning toward n8n/Make ("high-level usability and reliability is focus"). PM vendors recommend Workato by default - this is a risk.

groundTruth.whatHappenedNext: Sent comprehensive follow-up with ROI calculator, comparison rubric, and confirmed Feb 9 SA meeting
actualRisksThatMaterialized: Sticker shock at $50-100K vs $22K self-serve pricing
IntegrateHub positioning enterprise features at team-level pricing
PM vendors defaulting to IntegrateHub recommendations

context.lastInteraction: Comprehensive follow-up email with ROI calculator and value justification
painPoints: Added context: could onboard 15-20 customers/week vs current 5 if automated
